DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare diagnostic accuracy novel endoscopic ultrasound ( EUS ) biopsy needle current standard EUS needle . The investigator hypothesize SharkcoreTM needle diagnostic yield 90 % possible subepithelial lesion ( SEL ) within Gastrointestinal ( GI ) tract versus 60 % yield current needle .
DOC.brief_title: Endoscopic Ultrasound ( EUS ) Fine Needle Biopsy ( FNB ) Submucosal Nodule
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old hypoechoic lesion > 8 mm within GI lumen less 18 year old Uncorrectable coagulopathy ( INR > 1.5 ) Uncorrectable thrombocytopenia ( platelet count < 50,000 ) Pregnant woman Refusal consent
